content_data.title: Order Confirmation
content_data.heading: Thank You for Your Order!
content_data.description: Your order has been placed successfully. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

info_sections.title: What's Next?
info_sections.content: We're preparing your order for shipment. You'll receive tracking information once your order ships.

info_sections.title: Questions?
info_sections.content: Contact our customer service team if you have any questions about your order.

labels.confirmation_email_sent: A confirmation email has been sent to

messages.success: Your order has been placed successfully!
messages.email_confirmation: A confirmation email has been sent to {email}
messages.processing_note: Please allow 1-2 business days for processing

content_data.meta_description: Your order has been placed successfully. View your order details and track your shipment.

content_data.title: Payment Failed
content_data.heading: Payment Unsuccessful
content_data.description: We were unable to process your payment. Please try again or use a different payment method.

info_sections.title: Common Reasons
info_sections.content: Insufficient funds, incorrect card details, or bank security holds can cause payment failures.

info_sections.title: Your Cart is Safe
info_sections.content: Don't worry - your cart items are saved. Try again when you're ready.

messages.generic_error: Your payment could not be processed. Please try again.
messages.card_declined: Your card was declined. Please try a different payment method.
messages.insufficient_funds: Insufficient funds. Please use a different card or payment method.
messages.expired_card: Your card has expired. Please use a valid card.
messages.invalid_card: Invalid card details. Please check and try again.
messages.processing_error: A processing error occurred. Please try again later.
messages.cart_preserved: Your cart items have been saved for you.

content_data.meta_description: We were unable to process your payment. Please try again or use a different payment method.

content_data.title: Processing Payment
content_data.heading: Processing Your Payment
content_data.description: Please wait while we process your payment. Do not close this window.

info_sections.title: Please Wait
info_sections.content: This usually takes less than a minute. Please don't refresh or close this page.

labels.do_not_close: Please do not close this window
labels.this_may_take: This may take a few moments

messages.processing: We're processing your payment. This usually takes less than a minute.
messages.do_not_refresh: Please do not refresh or close this page while we process your payment.
messages.secure_connection: Your payment is being processed over a secure connection.

content_data.meta_description: Your payment is being processed. Please do not close this window.

content_data.title: Track Your Order
content_data.heading: Track Your Order
content_data.description: Enter your order number and email to track your shipment.

info_sections.title: Where's My Order Number?
info_sections.content: You can find your order number in your confirmation email or in your account order history.

messages.order_not_found: We couldn't find an order with that information. Please check and try again.
messages.tracking_available: Tracking information is available for your order.
messages.not_yet_shipped: Your order hasn't shipped yet. We'll send you an email with tracking info once it does.

content_data.meta_description: Track your order status and shipment. Enter your order number to get real-time updates.

content_data.title: Order Lookup
content_data.heading: Find Your Order
content_data.description: Don't have an account? Look up your order using your email and order number.

info_sections.title: Create an Account
info_sections.content: Create an account to easily view all your orders, save addresses, and track shipments.

info_sections.title: Need Help?
info_sections.content: Can't find your order? Contact our customer service team for assistance.

messages.order_not_found: We couldn't find an order matching those details. Please verify your information.
messages.order_found: Order found! Here are your order details.
messages.multiple_attempts: Too many attempts. Please try again later or contact support.
messages.create_account_prompt: Create an account to access your orders anytime and get exclusive perks!

content_data.meta_description: Look up your guest order using your email and order number. Track shipments and view order details.
